programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: When entertaining, we like desserts that look more complicated to prepare than they really are. A chocolate mousse cake or chilled lemon soufflé requires basic ingredients but is sure to elicit the proper oohs and aahs from guests.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We like appetizers that deliver big flavor without much work. This means spiced nuts that are not overly sweet, spinach dip that is bold and creamy (not watery and insipid), and beef satay that is tender and vibrant.

programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster make Cheesy Stuffed Shells. Equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for 13 by 9-inch broiler-safe baking dishes. Bryan Roof makes Julia Eggplant Pecorino.

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Most cooks are under the impression that good soup takes all day to prepare. We'll show you how to make simplified versions of two favorite soups: chicken noodle and Italian pasta and bean.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Soup for supper is an appealing concept, especially on a cold night. But for soup to work as a main course, it better be hearty. Our vibrant lentil soup fits the bill, and we round out this meal with quick cheese bread.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Some local dishes become so popular that they transcend their region. Gumbo is a taste of Louisiana in a big old bowl. And Cincinnati chili is American original, served with buttered spaghetti, kidney beans, cheddar cheese, and chopped onions.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: It sometimes seems the simplest recipes suffer the worst fate in modern cookbooks. The test kitchen was committed to breathing new life into these old-fashioned American recipes: stuffed pork chops, gravy, and glazed carrots.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We offer two inspired takes on roast chicken. Our roast lemon chicken ends with a twist. And there's nothing conventional about cooking a butterflied chicken under a brick. But these two recipes both deliver crisp skin and lots of flavors.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Quick and easy weeknight cooking can still yield great results. We start with two quick-cooking classics— sautéed chicken cutlets and pan-seared shrimp—and elevate them from the everyday.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we offer delicious, relatively straightforward fare that appeals to young and old. What kid—or adult—doesn't look forward to macaroni and cheese or barbecued chicken?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We take some of our favorite restaurant recipes—Crab Towers and Flambéed Pan-Roasted Lobster—and show you how to make them work in a home kitchen.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Huge meaty flavor—combined with spice, smoke, and fire—epitomizes Texas barbecue. Could we figure out how to make authentic Texas beef ribs in our Boston-based test kitchen?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: On occasion, we break the bank and buy a beef tenderloin. The tender, buttery interior is the big draw, and the combination of a healthy dose of seasoning and the flavor from the grill is a perfect solution to an otherwise mild-tasting piece of meat.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow Detectives

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow Detectives

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow Detectives
programme.desc: Hilary Kay investigates a tiny Victorian sketchbook but who was the artist and how did he come to lose what must have been a treasured possession?

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow Detectives

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A travelling bar and an amusing mechanical rabbit - just two of the more unusual articles to turn up among the antiques at Elgin in Scotland.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Sevres plates with false marks, a silver dachshund with a detachable head, and an early chest-on-chest ingeniously cut in half to fit a house, a rich mixture of treasures shown to the experts when they visit Hornchurch in Essex.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.desc: Keyaira urges Deshayla to assert herself more in the house; outcasts Sayyora and Briana try to distract themselves with men and bucket list challenges, but Briana's fiery temper sparks another house blow-up.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: East Meets West
programme.desc: Francesca, Sayyora, Kiyanna and Briana find their way back to each other, but Sayyora's insecurities and dependence on alcohol raise concerns; Keyaira and Seven get a surprise that has the whole house celebrating.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: East Meets West
programme.desc: Seven and Keyaira turn up the club with their performances; unresolved issues between the cliques cause a showdown; Briana and Francesca finally solidify their bond.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: East Meets West
programme.desc: Keyaira and Seven question Deshayla's loyalty when she hangs out with the enemy; in a final push to win the most points for their coasts, the Bad Girls race to complete tasks to win the Bucket List Challenge.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: During the roommates' first night out, Leslie finds herself kicked out of a club; the others pick on Ripsi.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: Ripsi attacks Kerry and Jodie; the roommates meet about Ripsi's departure.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: The others make a decision about Ripsi; Kerry's boyfriend visits.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: Zara finds a new friend in Tomik; Kerry bonds with Jodie.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: The new roommate moves in; Zara tries to keep her late night a secret.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: Tomik and Aimee argue; Jodie meets a cute guy.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: Zara makes a racially insensitive comment, causing tension within the house.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: Bad behavior abounds during a camping trip; Ty deals with boyfriend troubles.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: The timid owner of City Bistro in St. Louis, MO, looks the other way as her raunchy bartenders flash customers to drum up business.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: An explosive conflict breaks out among the owners of Dale 1891 when Jon discovers one of them has been siphoning off profits.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A former doctor decides to run The Bridge Lounge, his father's once-successful bar but runs into trouble when the BP oil spill devastates the local customer base.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: He's no stranger to unkempt bars, but Jon is absolutely disgusted by the rat, roach, and raccoon problem inside Freaki Tiki.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is called in to help the failing owner of Baseline Sports Bar, whose sexually exploitive spaghetti wrestling events have driven away female customers.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon must help the owner of George & Dragon come to terms with his mother's death before he drinks away all his profits and the family legacy.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: After convincing his friends to invest their life savings, the rookie bar owner of Cirivello's has turned a community staple into a money pit and now faces a hostile takeover.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon has a hard time getting through to the owner of the Black Light District, who's convinced fixing up his rancid dive would be a betrayal of his punk rock credo.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: The owner of City Bar compounded his troubles when he approved a poorly received fetish night, so Jon must help him come up with a new plan to whip up business.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon needs the nice-guy owner of Champagne's Cafe, a classic Vegas dive with a storied Mafia history, to start acting like a wise guy.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: When a military veteran/bar owner responds to criticism of his philanthropic work with nasty comments online, his business is sent into a tailspin.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A roller rink bar in a tiny desert town is in danger of closing for good if Jon can't get the hometown hero who owns it to take control.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon's attempt to save the YNot Sports Pub & Grub gets off to a bad start when there isn't enough staff on hand for a stress test.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: The Tradewinds bar could shut down for good if Jon can't get a lazy stepson to step into his new role as manager.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Reports of a coming storm and enormous waves bring painful memories for Mitch. Meanwhile, Kaye tries to persuade the parents of a deaf girl to send her to sign-language school.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A drugged-out drifter torches Eddie's lifeguard tower which leads the team to discover an illegal, lab distributing a new drug. Mitch and Thorpe try to convince the city board to buy wave runners in order to optimize their ability to save lives.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Eddie slips on the sand and hits his head on the tower ramp. When he regains consciousness, Eddie finds himself on an island with Gilligan, Mary Ann and the rest of the castaways.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch has an out-of-body experience when his attempt to save a trapped diver without scuba gear leaves him with the bends, dangerously close to death and in desperate need of a decompression chamber.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Shauni is suspicious when a swimmer training for the Olympics disappears in "Shark's Cove.” Eddie's world is turned upside-down when he is reunited with his schizophrenic half-brother.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A bohemian poet flirts with Shauni, and with danger when he uses his metal detector to find the buried stash of two jewel thieves.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch helps a former lifeguard, Lane Brody, investigate a corporation suspected of dumping deadly chemicals in the bay.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Harvey and Mitch go to play poker on an offshore yacht where they are robbed by a masked man that drives an amphibious Jeep. Shauni invites Eddie over for dinner at her parents’ house where her snobbish father strongly disapproves of him.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Shauni and Eddie visit a local fortune teller who predicts that Eddie will soon meet his first true love. Shauni thought he already had, and that it was her! But it's Lorna, an older woman Eddie had a "Summer of '42" affair with as a teenager.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: The mysterious death of Mitch's uncle and the cryptic will he left, finds Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, and Shauni on a whitewater rafting adventure. Meanwhile, rookie lifeguard hopefuls participate in the annual qualifying swim.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A whitewater rafting trip turns deadly when Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, Shauni and CJ are pursued by the murderous miners that killed Mitch's uncle to get his map leading to the "Golden Boot" that Mitch and the others are now searching for.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Jimmy Slade and Matt Brody tangle with a violent surf gang, while Mitch's life is thrown into turmoil when former lover Stephanie Holden assumes co-command of Baywatch headquarters.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Summer and Matt face grueling personal and physical challenges in Rookie School, the "boot camp” of lifeguarding, while unusual circumstances force female odd couple CJ and Stephanie to share an apartment.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Hobie and Summer each find themselves torn between doing the right thing and giving in to dangerous social pressures.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Bridget is worried her brother-in-law Kevin, 38, is having an inappropriate relationship with her daughter, Grace,16. Red flags went up when Grace told her that Kevin put whipped cream on his neck & asked her to lick it off. Kevin denies it all. Pt. 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Last year, Judy says her husband of 30 years, Danny, suffered a mid-life crisis, had an affair and filed for divorce -- but now he wants her back. What advice does Dr. Phil give the couple?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues with Crystal who accuses her ex-boyfriend of sexually assaulting their child. Crystal’s mom, Barbara, says Anthony is a “disgusting, lying, abusive narcissist” and he says Barbara is a “lowlife dirtbag”. Dr. Phil moderates. Part 2

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Jenaye comes face-to-face for the first time with the woman her husband, James, slept with on their fifth wedding anniversary. The woman, Chelsey, who is also James's former hairstylist, tells her side of the story. Will Jenaye believe Chelsey's claims?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Julie & Mike say daughter Brooke, 16, may look sweet & innocent, but she's an out-of-control teen who fights, runs away from home, shoplifts & dates older men. Plus, meet Jody, an admitted alcoholic & anorexic. Can Dr. Phil save these two from themselves?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Tom is 100% convinced his fiancée, Teaka, is cheating on him with his friends, neighbors, coworkers, & even the mailman! Tom has all-new video evidence to show Dr. Phil & Teaka to prove Teaka's unfaithfulness. Teaka declares she has never cheated on Tom.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Lorie says husband, Dan, knew she placed a baby for adoption when she was 15 & he always supported her finding him. Dan says after reuniting with son, John, 26, family life shattered. Dan says he believes Lorie & John have an inappropriate relationship.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Pamela says she is likely going to jail for not complying with court orders because she refuses to allow her ex, Justin, his court-ordered visitations. Pamela says Justin attempted to drown their oldest daughter in the pool. Justin says they are lies!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Many were stunned and outraged when Casey Anthony was acquitted of murder charges in her daughter Caylee's death. Lead prosecutor Jeff Ashton joins Dr. Phil to answer some hard-hitting questions about where his case went wrong.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: McKinley, 18, says she decided 5 years ago she never wanted to see her dad, Cory, again, after learning he went to jail on two counts of sexual battery of a minor! She says her dad is a violent, dangerous, "psychopath". Cory says he's never abused anyone.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Waco & Alley left their home state with their 3-year-old child, missing a custody hearing, & have no idea the court then granted guardianship to Waco's parents. Tensions run high when Dr. Phil reveals to Waco & Alley they lost custody of their child!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Brooklyn, 18, says she is tired of her mom butting into her love life with boyfriend Eric. Mom Courtney says it's because Brooklyn's boyfriend has two children & a wife! Eric's wife, Mandy, wants Brooklyn to leave her husband alone & she'll fight for him.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Karen writes to Dr. Phil saying her husband mentally abuses her by telling her how fat she is, how terrible she looks, criticizes her makeup, calls her names, tells fat jokes. She hides in a bathroom to eat and he won't touch her "until she loses 200 lbs

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Was this teacher drunk In her elementary school classroom? Listen to what this educator has to say.

channel.display-name: Best of The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: CBS Mornings" co-host Gayle King is joining Drew and Ross Mathews to hit the headlines, covering topics like the woman who found an unusual way to calm her nerves before a first kiss.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Neighborhood" star Cedric the Entertainer is telling Drew about his twenty years of marriage and being back on the road again doing comedy shows.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Abbott Elementary" star Lisa Ann Walter is joining Drew as a co-pilot all show long and talking all about "Abbott Elementary" and working with Lindsay Lohan on "The Parent Trap!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny side up in an all-new Drew's News. Plus, "Bros" stars Ts Madison, Jim Rash and Miss Lawrence.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Fleishman Is In Trouble" star Jesse Eisenberg shares his thoughts on dating apps, relationships and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Chef Remi Cruz is joining Drew in the kitchen to whip up some delicious fried mac n' cheese bites. The world's oldest female comedian Dionne Forest is doing a hilarious stand-up set.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Iconic duo and longtime best friends Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin are chatting with Drew all about meeting her as a kid, their new film, "Moving On," their secrets to a lasting friendship and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Tony Dokoupil joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk to hit the headlines! James Beard Award-winning author Tamar Adler joins Drew andTonyDokoupil in the kitchen to serve up something delicious.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are hitting the headlines in an all-new Drew's News. Drew chats with "The Fabelmans" star Gabe LaBelle who shares what it was like working with and portraying a young Steven Spielberg. Chef Melissa King joins Drew in the kitchen.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Senator Bernie Sanders is joining Drew to chat about his new book. He's also joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk to discuss local Vermont headlines and share some of his favorite Vermont-based small businesses.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Confess Fletch" star and avid dog lover Jon Hamm plays a rousing game of Pup Quiz with Drew and rescue dogs available for adoption.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: All American" star Taye Diggs is joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to hit the hottest headlines of the day! Jamila Norman is joining Drew and Taye and sharing tips on how to build your own herb garden.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Actress and author of the new audiobook, "Inside Voice" Lake Bell stops by to chat.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Last Thing He Told Me" star Jennifer Garner is getting a big birthday surprise from Drew.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: In an all-new Drew Gooder, Drew is surprising a deserving nurse and retired postal worker who founded a local chapter of non-profit to help underserved communities receive free or low-cost medical care.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews dive into amazing animal headlines in an all-new Drew's News: Dr. Drew-Little Edition. Then, competing viewers face-off in a Mac N Cheese cook-off you won't want to miss!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The cast of "Daisy Jones and the Six" talk with Drew about their new show! They're chatting all about the 70's theme of the show, their time on set and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew interviews President Joe Biden and First Lady Jill Biden, discussing their relationship and Christmas traditions. FLOTUS gives a tour of the White House Christmas Decorations.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is joined by Hillary Rodham Clinton and her daughter Chelsea Clinton, who share what it was like going on adventures for new docuseries, "Gutsy.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: A Good Person" director and producer Zach Braff is telling Drew about the real-life inspiration behind his new film, working on it with Florence Pugh and why he got his pilot's license.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Queen Latifah shares behind-the-scenes stories. Chris Appleton does music teacher's hair. Drew's News w/ Ross Mathews & Mikel Welch. TikToker Sarah T. shows hack for lamp cords.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Honk for Jesus" star Regina Hall joins Drew to chat. Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Plus, In A Minute Drew and Regina surprise one lucky audience member with a big prize!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is chatting with John Stamos! "A League of Their Own" star Abbi Jacobson is joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk to cover today's hottest headlines.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Camilla Cabello opens-up about dating, what she's looking for in her next partner, working with relationship goals couple Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton on "The Voice" and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Power" star Toni Collette is telling Drew about her new show. Plus she's joining Drew in the kitchen to cook something delicious.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Actress Eva Longoria is joining Drew in the kitchen and they're cooking up Spaghetti Alle Vongole. Best-selling author Lewis Howes joins Drew and Ross Mathewsat the Drew's News desk.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: ESPN Monday Night Football" commentator Joe Buck joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to break down the latest headlines of the day.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale's idea for Christmas presents are ones only fit for coastal California

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny tries to find the perfect man for Elly May.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny encounters a kangaroo, and thinks she's found a giant jackrabbit, but no one will believe her.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: A father and daughter from back home come to Beverly Hills to meet Jed.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Lafe Crick comes back in another scheme to get rich off the Clampetts' wealth.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly May competes in a contest to determine "The Queen of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Dr. Martin of the zoo keeps giving Ellie more critters than Granny can stand. While Jim Gardner (or Jim Garrrrr!) comes to sell "bug vittles" but ends up falling for Ellie.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed and Mr. Drysdale try matching Ellie with the bank's new CPA Fred Penrod (or Rod Fredpen) while Lafe continues to try to find where "Jed has his money buried".

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Lafe Crick tries some match making with his son Dub and Ellie. Jed has his reservations.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale tries to get the Clampetts interested in deep-sea fishing by sending them to Marineland. Thinking that it's a fishing hole, Granny wants to "catch the whale".

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: It's tonic time in Beverly Hills. Granny's made a batch of tonic and sends a sample to their new neighbor, the Countess Maria. She loves it and throws a party to celebrate.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale is having a ground-breaking ceremony for a new bank building and the Clampetts think they need to pitch in to help build it. Meanwhile, Mr. Drysdale's associates try to get stock market tips off of Jed.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts get a big food package from home and Mr. Drysdale's two associates, Mr. Lucus and Mr. Pendleton think that the crawdads have something to do with the development of military reconnaissance technology.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale has Jed buy a Beverly Hills dress store for an investment and the Clampetts show up to help "the poor widow and her starving girls".

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts try to turn their newly acquired Beverly Hills dress boutique, The House of Renee, into a country store, The House of Granny.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed sends Elly to the Beverly Hills dress boutique he used to own (now the House of Maurice) to learn how to be a lady, where Mrs. Drysdale mistakes her for royalty.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale wants Jed to incorporate for the tax advantages. So the Clampetts take over the top floor of the Commerce Bank and start doing what they can to stimulate the economy by getting more money into the hands of more people.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny's driving and Ellie's cooking makes a policeman and a cab driver think that the Clampett Mansion is a mental institution.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale gets Jed's old cabin from back home and sets it up in the Clampett's backyard to surprise Granny on her birthday. A coed with a sociology major thinks that they live there as the Drysdale's servants.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drysdale hires a demolition man to remove the Clampett's cabin. Mr. Drysdale decides to occupy the cabin so it can't be removed. The Clampetts think a "homewrecker" is breaking up the Drysdale's marriage.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro's running late for his graduation ceremony despite his new watch. Mrs. Potts of Jethro's school is afraid that his attendance will jeopardize her chances for a new endowment. Cousin Bessie saves the day.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale buys Mammoth Pictures, a movie studio. Jed, Granny, Elly and Jethro try to "help" the studio, which is losing money, by working at the studio.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale tells the Clampetts that he is building a city on the location where Jed's movie studio is located. The Clampetts mistake a western prop town for the city.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts decide to run the store on the empty studio Western set but can't understand why they don't have any customers.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed gets an honorary doctorate when he donates money to the college that Mr. Drysdale attended. Now the family thinks he can now practice medicine, which doesn't sit well with Granny.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drysdale thinks she can get the hillbillies to move out by throwing herself at Jed. Meanwhile Granny is itching to fight her because she fell into the cement pond when Jed had to stop a fight between them earlier.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: An old friend from back in the hills is now an Elvis like singing idol. The Clampetts misunderstand the situation and decide to help Johnny get on his feet.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Noah's father's company is sued by Matt; Katie moves forward with David; a nannycam catches Matt and Kelly making love; Steve goes Y2Krazy, ignoring - or avoiding - a trip with Janet; a model makes a play for Donna.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Kelly receives medical treatment and files a police report. Matt helps a thief gain his release through a technicality. Although Dylan warns that she is still fragile, David asks Gina on a date.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Kelly is arrested and held overnight until the shooting is ruled a justifiable homicide. David asks Dylan to move out. Wayne annoys Donna with his cavalier attitude, particularly when he fails to show sensitivity toward Kelly.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Steve buys an engagement ring and practices proposals, often with Noah assuming the role of Janet. Dylan grows tired of living with Gina and suggests that she find her own place. David's radio show becomes popular due to his abrasive tactics.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Steve and Janet announce the pregnancy and engagement to her parents, who respond by calling Janet a disgrace. Matt and Noah each offer to move out so that Steve can move Janet and the baby into the house.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: David's radio persona gets flack-and ratings; Matt tries to overturn a death sentence for a rapist-murderer; the after-hours club attracts the wrong attention; Steve haunts the house.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Janet begins to panic about wedding preparations. Steve suggests that they organize a scavenger hunt for their friends, with clues providing the location of a party. Gina freaks out when Dylan refuses to pull over and help a stray dog.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Steve and Janet endure various calamaties on their honeymoon. Just as they are beginning to have a good time, Janet goes into labor. Jackie seeks full custody of Erin, and David and Kelly try to keep their sister's spirits up.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Gina's meeting with her father is unsatisfying, similar to Janet and her parents; Donna can't let go of Noah's accident; Dylan loses control in front of kids, and has second thoughts about Kelly, but is too late.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Donna and David meet promising new mates; Kelly decides to quit the store; Matt violates his suspension; Dylan suffers from fast-lane acquaintances; the Sanders' hire a nanny.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Dylan accedes to Shane's demands for Noah; Kelly and Matt prepare to go on a couples game show; Dr. Martin tries to bond with Gina.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: A news report shows a live dead-ringer for Dylan's late father; Noah intrudes on Donna's meeting someone new; Kelly compromises her personal feelings for her profession; David gets the wrong idea when he overhears Camille talking with friends.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Dylan's father makes him an offer; Steve lobbies for Ryan's return to college; David interviews for a job in New York; Matt represents a stand-up comic fired for not being funny.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Kelly grows suspicious of Matt's distant behavior. Camille tries to convince Donna to sell her clothing online. Steve and Janet fear that her parents' dog is to blame for the death of their snooty neighbors' pet rabbit.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Tonight, all three parts of the Head of Household competition play out. Who will emerge victorious and earn the power to cast the final eviction vote of BB 24? Plus, the jury returns to choose the winner of the $750,000 grand prize.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Sixteen complete strangers enter this house, to try to make their own mark on 'BB' history. Totally cut off from the outside world, they compete for safety and power. Each week, they will vote to evict one of their own, until only one houseguest ...

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Will Cirie and Jared be able to keep their mother son secret under wraps? Plus what other twists does the Big Brother multiverse have in store, and who will claim power and become the first Head of Household of the season.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: It's the first Veto competition of the summer, will the golden power save one of the nominees? Plus the game kicks into gear as major alliances begin to form.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Tonight, the houseguests will vote to evict either Felicia or Kirsten. Plus, what terrifying twist will emerge from the scary-verse?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Where did the houseguests go? Plus who will become the new Head of Household, and what game changing twists will emerge from the nether-region?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Tonight, the power of veto is on the line. Will it save Reilly or Cameron from the chopping block? Plus, which soul will be sent to the nether-region next, and how will it impact the game?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Is there trouble in paradise for the professor's alliance? And will it lead to a flip on Hisam to send Cameron packing instead of Riley?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: The Head of Household is on the line, who will rise to glory and which two houseguests will end up on the chopping block? Plus is a summer show-mance blossoming?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Who will win the power of veto, and will the plan to blindside Hisam succeed? Plus, Jared and Blue continue to get closer, but will his mom put a stop to it?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: With the doctor's game on life support, will the house stick to their plan of saying by-sam to Hisam? Plus, for 18 years, fans have demanded the return of the epic pressure cooker competition. Tonight, it's back.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Who will survive this epic competition and rise to power, and which Houseguest will end up on the block?

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: Who delivers ten times out of ten? Samuel L. Jackson is SHAFT, the man and the movie. John Singleton ("Boys 'n' the Hood") directs this gritty, action-packed thriller.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: As ‘ The Chosen One’, Murphy’s on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who’s been abducted by an evil cult.

programme.title: Higher Learning
programme.desc: Kristy Swanson, Omar Epps and Michael Rapaport star as first-term freshmen who get a crash course in diversity, identity and sexuality in writer/director John Singleton's bold look at contemporary college life.

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: After a humiliating experience on an airplane, Nashawn sues the airline and is awarded a huge settlement. Determined to make good with the money, Nashawn creates the full service airline of his dreams, complete with sexy stewardesses & funky music.

programme.title: Nas: Time is Illmatic (Giant)
programme.desc: The story behind Nas's groundbreaking debut album 'Illmatic,' and the early life of one of the most talented rappers of all time. Featuring Pharrell Williams, Alicia Keys, Q-Tip, and Busta Rhymes.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Sanford and Son
programme.desc: An innocent shopping trip turns violent when a shady salesman refuses to grant a time payment plan to anyone over 65. Incensed by the salesman's policy, Fred becomes the leader of a militant gang of oldsters in search of revenge.

programme.title: Sanford and Son
programme.desc: Fred and Lamont need a quick $4,000 to buy the Sanford Arms. Investing their last $500 in a poker game, Fred wins. He successfully parlays those winnings at the racetrack. Now he's off to Las Vegas to try and do it again. How long can his luck hold out?

programme.title: Sanford and Son
programme.desc: Fred is so certain he is a descendant of a famous person that he pays a company $25 to trace his roots. But the secret the company digs up could change the rest of his life.

programme.title: Sanford and Son
programme.desc: Fred invites B.B. King to dinner at the Sanford home and may give the famous singer another reason to sing the blues. B.B. King guest stars.

programme.title: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: George haunted by his past.

programme.title: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: A relative problem.

programme.title: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: The agony and the ecstasy.

programme.title: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: George meets the press.

programme.title: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: A compliment or a curse?

programme.title: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: A class clash?
In charge of the big choir competition, Mary must make room in her have for the visiting choir's deacon, who is notoriously arrogant, thoughtless and pushy.
Alarmed by Brenda and her friends' casual attitude about teen pregnancy, Mary uses some unusual methods to teach them a lesson about parenting that they'll never forget.
Mary is delighted to learn that Lester will be named 'Man of the Year' by the local Men's Club...and distraught upon discovering she's not allowed to attend the special ceremony.
To protest the opening of a sleazy club in her neighborhood, Mary dreams of running the varmints out of town.
In an effort to help Lester build his business, Mary takes some questionable steps to land him a big construction contract.
Mary and Lester are shocked when his cousin Ed's enviable 'picture-perfect' marriage suddenly falls apart.

When Mary and Sandra go to court to settle a dispute over song royalties, Sandra's ammunition is veteran 'barrister' John Houseman, while Mary's ace in the hole is a 'Supreme' expert witness, singer Mary Wilson.
Mayhem and murder plague 227 when a mysterious man with a knife rents an apartment in Mary's building.

When Mary and Lester go to the reading of his uncle's will, they are both surprised to learn they have distant cousins whom they've never met, and even more confused when they discover they are a different color.
When Lester's old high school sweetheart comes to the neighborhood in search of a new home, Mary fears that she'll try to move in on more than just her turf.
Suffering from a very cold winter spell, the residents of '227' invade Mary and Lester's apartment, which is one of two apartments with heat.
When Mary and Lester's school teacher friend Mitchell meets Sandra, he sets out to win her pampered heart, no matter how many gifts or expensive dates it takes.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: Prom night could wind up being a date with disaster when Tia and Tamera's escorts behave badly, and Roger's date towers over him.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: Love is in the air when Tamera, Lisa, and Ray all have close encounters of the romantic kind.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: Tia and Tamera rescue a pig who's being mistreated by its owner and attempt to secretly stash the "porker" at home.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: While recovering from "twin appendectomies," Tia and Tamera go in search of hospital records that could reveal the identities of their biological parents.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: When Lisa forbids Tia to see her boyfriend Michael, Tamera acts as a go-between for the couple -- but finds herself falling for him.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The crew turns up at Bae's bachelorette party. Sky spreads a rumor about Jadah. Donna is in hot water after Alex posts a scandalous video. Sky attempts to repair her relationship with the son she gave up for adoption 15 years ago.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Donna is rushed to the emergency room. Sky embarks on a spiritual journey with one of O'S**t's baby mamas. The Fat Jewish stops by the shop for a tattoo chosen by his Instagram followers. And Ted throws a launch party for his new sneaker line.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: O'S**t tries to bring the mothers of his children together. Sky decides she's ready to have a baby and enlists Ceaser to help. Walt hits rock bottom and must send his kids to live with their mom. Jadah goes ballistic when Donna tells her she's moving

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The crew decides to secretly perform a paternity test on O'S**t's new baby. Ted and Sky go on a date that has a surprising outcome. Donna campaigns to be Bae's doula. Walt works hard to get his kids back home. Alex confronts his dad about past abuse.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Donna is caught trying to steal Mel's client, but O'S**t commits the ultimate betrayal when he seeks a job with Ceaser's biggest enemy. A woman who claims Black Ink gave her an infected tattoo tries to take down Ceaser

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Sky throws a party that has everybody gagging. A video of Donna getting intimate with a coworker goes viral. Walt puts on an exhibition hoping to get his finances on track. Ceaser's apartment is invaded by his daughter.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser and the crew crash Sky's vacation in Miami. Kitty launches an attack on Ceaser. Alex reveals his true feelings to Donna and an unexpected guest shows up seeking revenge.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The crew continues to turn up on South Beach. Alex is rushed to the emergency room after he collapses on the beach. Jadah and Tati come to blows. Ceaser throws a Scarfaced-themed party to impress a girl and Donna confesses her feelings to Alex.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Donna is jealous when Ceaser doesn't choose her to help open a new shop in NOLA (which drives a wedge between her and Alex), and Young Bae becomes a citizen and a mother.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Donna catches Alex partying with strippers, Sky's son makes a shocking announcement about his post-graduation plans, and Melody reaches out to her mom's estranged family.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: An old feud flares up when Jadah arrives in New Orleans, Walt confronts Ceaser about calling him a drunk, and Melody's estranged cousin stands her up.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Jadah shares big news, Miss Kitty asks Young Bae for a favor, Sky faces off with Herb, and the staff is shocked when the New Orleans shop is vandalized on opening day.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser fumes after discovering a New Orleans employee is a mole, Puma and O'S**t take advantage of Young Bae to wreck the 113th shop, and Alex's dad faces a risky surgery.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser reconnects with his daughter Cheyenne, Young Bae hires a new receptionist who has to prove herself to the crew, and Alex starts to notice some relationship red flags.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Nick tries to help his mother forge bonds with Kevin and Lindsey. Meanwhile, Suzanne gets the day off.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Young Kevin gets a kick out of soccer, but Nick doesn't see the appeal. Meanwhile, Lindsey's secretiveness exasperates Suzanne, who then snoops online into her teen daughter's private life.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: When a rat gets lost in the home, Kevin scurries to care for it. Meanwhile, an ex-flame creates surging tension between Lindsey and Gigi.

programme.desc: Suzanne isn't a sport when Nick watches a game with friends at a sports bar with alluring waitresses. Elsewhere, the children ask for more allowance, but they reject doing any added chores.

programme.desc: Suzanne becomes a viral-video sensation after she's caught dancing on camera. Meanwhile, Marilyn serves up soul-food lessons to young Lindsey.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando tres empleados de restaurantes mueren en un robo/homicidio en Las Vegas, Nevada, la UAC busca pistas en un caso cerrado que sucedió en la ciudad hace seis años.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El equipo de NCIS investiga el brutal asesinato de un Teniente de la Marina que recién había regresado de Medio Oriente.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Gibbs continúa trabajando con el Capitan Wescott mientras él revisa sus propios rastros para ayudar al equipo atrapar a un importante terrorista.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Mientras el equipo de NCIS investiga el secuestro de una adolescente, Ziva y Abby trabajan en conjunto con una joven amiga, que fue testigo del secuestro.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Gibbs se une al Agente Fornell del FBI para investigar su intento de asesinato. Pero terminan enfrentando una situación inesperada cuando la ex esposa de ambos se involucra.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El Mustang Bullitt
programme.desc: Danny y Báez investigan el robo del famoso coche que se conducía en una película clásica, ahora propiedad de Owen Cairo (Anthony Edwards).

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Héroes olvidados
programme.desc: Cuando Danny y su familia son amenazados por Thomas Wilder (Louis Cancelmi), un asesino en serie que Danny no ha podido detener, la preocupación de Linda se intensifica por el trabajo de su marido y por el estado de su matrimonio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Resistencia
programme.desc: Erin retoma un caso de homicidio estancado y, con la ayuda de Anthony Abetemarco, busca un testigo clave que había desaparecido.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Las banderas de nuestros padres
programme.desc: Danny es interrogado por el investigador del fiscal de distrito cuando su expareja es acusada de colocar pruebas para cerrar un caso de homicidio.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando tres empleados de restaurantes mueren en un robo/homicidio en Las Vegas, Nevada, la UAC busca pistas en un caso cerrado que sucedió en la ciudad hace seis años.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la UAC investiga incidentes de cadáveres que son incorporados en el macabro arte del graffiti en Detroit, sospechan que un escurridizo, pero notorio artista callejero podría ser el sospechoso.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando asesinan a una mujer en una pequeña ciudad de Florida, habitada enteramente por delincuentes sexuales, La UAC se enfrenta a una comunidad repleta de sospechosos. Además, Lewis tiene una oportunidad profesional que puede llevarla lejos de la UAC.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC ayuda a la hija periodista de Rossi, Joy (Amber Stevens West), a investigar la desaparición de una alumna de la universidad.

programme.title: The Last Cowboy

programme.title: The Last Cowboy
programme.desc: As the riders prepare for the Cactus Classic, Matt struggles when his horse has health issues, and Abby feels the pressure in her first competition since going solo.

programme.title: The Last Cowboy
programme.desc: Leading up to the Run for a Million show, Andrea undercuts Matt's search for the perfect horse, Abby deals with a flooded practice arena, and Craig seeks a much-needed payday.

programme.title: The Last Cowboy
programme.desc: At the National Reining Breeders Classic, Jason has a chance to prove his skills equal Andrea's, and Cade has to come through in the clutch.

programme.title: The Last Cowboy
programme.desc: Abby faces a tough decision, Casey deals with mounting home-construction costs, and the pressure rises as the riders choose the horses they'll take to Run for a Million.

programme.title: The Last Cowboy

programme.desc: Charm La'Donna teaches the candidates a hip-hop-style routine, the judges pick their charm squad, the ladies visit the Dallas VA Medical Center and two rookies are sent home.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers are left to solve the crime after signs of an apparent stabbing. A man loiters in a private park. A driver insists that the car is his - even though he needs a screwdriver to start the ignition and the plates are stolen.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman goes to great lengths to hide her daughter, a couple's glovebox holds a surprise, and an Uber driver gets more than she bargained for.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An Officer goes undercover as a prostitute. A woman finds a snake in her home. A man solicits himself to an undercover officer.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers conduct a routine traffic stop on a vehicle that ran a stop sign. Officers and residents systematically retrieve birds from a fireplace and release them outside. A police department conducts a drug-reversal-buy sting.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies confront a man holding a knife to his roommate’s neck over a prior argument. A suspect runs from deputies on a warrant charge. Suspected robbers are pulled over by deputies.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The victim of the home invasion robbery tells a dispatch operator that a man held him at gun-point. A man in a wheelchair is in a stand-off with campus police. Officers respond to a call about a knife-wielding assailant.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers spot two suspects on a city bus and a prolonged standoff occurs. A wanted man's friends lie to Deputies about his whereabouts. Deputies find meth in a one-armed man's truck.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man with multiple felony warrants gets one last taste of freedom before heading to prison. A speeding driver is arrested for the same thing he was arrested for the day before. A runaway suspect leaves a trail behind him.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police investigate an attempted residential robbery that turned deadly. Officers visit a residence to find a suspect facing warrant charges. A high-speed chase comes to an end when the suspect crashes into a fence.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man suspected of shoplifting attempts to ditch his clothes, and officers respond to a dispute between a shopkeeper and a man suspected of paying with counterfeit money.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Men seeking the services of a prostitute are arrested during a sting operation. New Jersey Police investigate a potential organized attack on a female suspect. Locals detain a man after he's caught burglarizing property in the area.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A prostitution sting in Las Vegas nets more than just johns, police respond to reports of a woman licking the sidewalk, and a patrol happens on a lovers' row in a parking lot.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A car chase involves tire spikes, shredded rubber, and crashed gates. Suspects accused of burglary state they only steal to pay rent. A traffic stop proves there’s always more than meets the eye.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An out-of-control driver wants to get home for his child's birthday, officers respond to a suspected shooting, and a trip to buy dog food turns into a run-in with the police.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies catch up to a group of teenagers enjoying a night of joyriding. A traffic stop opens the doors to recovery for a very repentant suspect. A suspect insists his car is not stolen because he did his online research.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver theorizes about America after fleeing a traffic stop, charges keep adding up for an unlicensed driver, and a woman stops at nothing to get to her trailer.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A female victim tells the officers that two men kicked in her front door. Three suspects attempt to steal a bicycle in an alley. Following routine questioning of a petrified wife, officer arrests the husband for domestic abuse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers encounter an unusual situation where the victim and suspect have barricaded themselves inside the house. Officers respond to a domestic dispute at a nearby apartment complex. A man explains how his ex-girlfriend climbed into his window.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers track down a suspect who eluded them earlier, a suspicious vehicle takes off at the sight of police, and a man gets busted for possession in front of his mom.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man assaults his sister and her dog, a gibberish-speaking man is arrested for attacking his neighbors, and a couple with no-contact orders tells conflicting stories.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police deploy spike strips to curb a stolen vehicle, a parolee at large speeds away with a two-month-old in the car, and officers try to determine the details of a stabbing.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A deputy questions a driver about why his broken-down car looks like it’s been in an accident. Obstacle after obstacle prevents a woman from fixing her janky vehicle. A young man looking for a fresh start falls on hard times.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect forgets to drive away after breaking into a used car lot. A dispute over money ends in tire slashing. Suspects are found with narcotics and tall tales.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police are led on a lengthy chase, a man is pulled over in a new car he doesn't own, and a detained woman has choice words about her boyfriend.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man and woman are pulled over while out on a candy run. A simple traffic violation turns into a multi-vehicle police pursuit. Deputies are notified of a stolen car and find the driver in possession of an interesting tool.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A knife wielding man hangs around the lot of a convenience store. An intoxicated man in speedos flees from the police after urinating in a parking lot. An officer responds to a domestic dispute after a man locks his girlfriend in the bathroom.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A distinctive tattoo reveals a wanted felon’s true identity. Deputies talk to a young woman who traded one bad habit for another. A man in possession of a stolen vehicle tells officers how his day went from bad to worse.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: CSI investigates the murder of a man who was covered in hair from head to toe and shot in the heart with a silver bullet.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team is brought into the world of tweakers and methamphetamines.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSIs enter the world of glamorous old Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: CSI investigates two deaths, both linked to the same killer.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom teams up with Lady Heather.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A body is discovered stuffed into a working chimney of a residential home.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A crime documentary series follows the CSIs for the first 48 hours of an investigation.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A high profile murder trial is thrown into a tailspin when two siblings confess to the same crime.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Science collides with the occult when the team investigates the case of a psychic who predicted her own murder.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSIs enter the world of rap music in order to investigate the deaths of three teenagers killed while working for rival rappers.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Solving the case of a wealthy defense attorney killed at her son's wedding is compromised when all of the evidence is stolen along with Nick's car.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The evidence in the case of a high-stakes gambler and ladies man murdered outside a casino after a night of revelry proves that appearances can be deceiving.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A man accused of murdering his wife and co-workers leads the CSIs on a wild chase through a busy Vegas casino.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team rallies around one of their own, who is shot in the line of duty and may not survive on the sixth season finale.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una serie documental sobre crímenes sigue a los CSI durante las primeras 48 horas de una investigación.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un juicio por asesinato de alto perfil cae en picada cuando dos hermanos confiesan el mismo crimen.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: La ciencia choca con lo oculto cuando el equipo investiga el caso de una psíquica que predijo su propio asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Los CSI entran al mundo de la música rap para investigar la muerte de tres adolescentes asesinados mientras trabajaban para raperos rivales.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Resolver el caso de un abogado defensor adinerado asesinado en la boda de su hijo, se ve comprometido cuando todas las pruebas son robadas junto con el auto de Nick.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: La evidencia demuestra que las apariencias engañan en el caso de un jugador de alto riesgo y mujeriego, asesinado fuera de un casino después de una noche de juerga.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un hombre acusado de asesinar a su esposa y compañeros de trabajo lidera a los CSI en una persecución salvaje a través de un concurrido casino de Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI se reúne en torno a uno de los suyos, al recibir un disparo en mientras cumplía su trabajo y es posible que no sobreviva en el final de la sexta temporada.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mientras Grissom guía a un grupo de universitarios en un tour por CSI, los muertos hablan mientras los CSI investigan, cada uno narrando su propio caso

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Los CSI investigan de primera mano los entresijos del Cirque du Soleil para determinar qué pudo contribuir a la prematura muerte de una joven bailarina.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom se siente fascinado cuando cada detalle de una miniatura es idéntico al de la escena de un crimen real, y se pone manos a la obra para intentar resolver el caso utilizando las pistas proporcionadas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un hombre inocente es brutalmente atacado y golpeado hasta la muerte por lo que parece un monstruo con una capa negra, los CSI son llamados para investigar, sólo para enterarse de que un ataque similar tuvo lugar minutos después.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando una mujer muerta aparece colgada de una cruz en el interior de una iglesia, el equipo sigue las pruebas para descubrir un extraño triángulo amoroso que se remonta a los días de instituto de la víctima.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando se denuncia la desaparición de dos niños, el principal sospechoso es un conocido delincuente sexual del barrio.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a bottle girl is murdered at an exclusive club, Horatio must search through Miami's most elite guest list to find her killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A young girl is kidnapped and the CSIs' only witness is a blind man, who heard the abduction, leading Horatio to an old nemesis.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When the killer of Horatio's wife busts out of prison and goes on a rampage, they must determine what he's after and find him before he strikes again.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a reality star is murdered, the CSIs investigate the cast, the obsessed fans, and the stars' hidden pasts to find the killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a man claims to have dreamed of a murder before it happened, Horatio must send Natalia undercover for the team to determine the truth.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a sugar refinery explodes, Horatio Caine and the CSI team make a shocking discovery about one of the factory's employees.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a fisherman narrowly escapes death, the CSI team has to dodge bullets to keep him alive and find out who's after him.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a pregnant woman is assaulted, Horatio and the team fight for her and her baby's life while tracking down her attacker.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When the investigation of a dead millionaire leads the CSIs to an elite dating service, Ryan poses as a businessman to expose the matchmaker's lies.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a fire hydrant washes away all the evidence at a crime scene, the CSIs must recreate a very bizarre double murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When the CSIs investigate a murder at a roller derby match, the only thing shorter than the girls' skirts are their tempers.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Miami is ablaze with crime and chaos when Memmo Fiero, Horatio Caine's wife's killer, returns to take control of the city.

programme.title: En nombre del amor
programme.desc: De Nicholas Sparks, el autor best-seller, llega esta conmovedora historia sobre hasta dónde estamos dispuestos a llegar para mantener viva la esperanza del amor.

programme.title: Legalmente rubias

programme.title: Como asesinar a una millonaria

programme.title: Decepcionado

programme.title: Treintona, soltera y fantástica
programme.desc: Una mujer en sus treinta y tantos años se descubre a sí misma a través de la vida, el amor y el corazón roto.

programme.title: Bent: Plan de venganza

programme.title: Terminator 2: juicio final

programme.title: En defensa del honor

programme.title: Una mujer sin filtro

programme.title: Un padre no tan padre

programme.title: Terrifier (LAS)

programme.title: Un romántico funeral

programme.title: Green Acres

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When the Monroe Brothers show up to fix the Douglas's closet, Lisa learns that Ralph is devastated because her true love has stood her up on another date. Lisa's solution: an intensive, two-day beauty treatment for Ralph…and the barn for Oliver!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver (Eddie Albert) takes to his soap box, delivering fiery, patriotic speeches after getting a bill from the State Farm Unattached Duty Tax for an outrageous $12.03! But no one can figure out why the tax is levied in the first place.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa (Eva Gabor) is curious to learn about the book that Oliver (Eddie Albert) is reading. It is the real-life story of pioneers Gus and Etta Thompson. The episode flashes back to the 19th century with Oliver appearing as Gus and Lisa as Etta.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Eb (Tom Lester) seeks dating advice from the Douglas's after laying eyes on former classmate Betty Jo Bradley from petticoat Junction. Oliver's well-intentioned guidance has mixed results when Eb hilariously misconstrues the advice he's given.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The locals complain that Oliver's penchant for wearing business suits to do farm work is ruining Hooterville's image. Oliver tries to adjust, but the last laugh is on him when Lisa has her dressmaker design Italian him some swanky new overalls.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The Hooterville Chamber of Commerce attempts to attract a Hollywood film studio to shoot a movie in town. And when a rumor spreads that a famous actor is arriving, the townsfolk are all abuzz as they prepare for their close-up, Mr. DeMille!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Fed up with the house being in dire need of repair, Lisa demands that Oliver arrange to have the house redone or she's moving back to New York. Oliver agrees, but is delayed when Mr. Haney claims that their farmhouse is a historic monument.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Everything is topsy-turvy and henhouse hijinks ensue when one of the Douglas' hens is found to be laying square eggs! News of this kind gets around quickly, and the townsfolk all get in on the race to capitalize on the impressive novelty.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver is absolutely determined to have a truly old-fashioned Christmas, including decorating his own farm-grown tree. But warm weather stands in the way and, he discovers, the residents of Hooterville aren't exactly as traditional as he thought.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: In true Hooterville fashion, Oliver (Eddie Albert) discovers that the town is vehemently split as to which weather reporter they trust. As debates rage over which forecast is correct, Oliver plants his tomato crop, hoping for the best.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: After another disastrous effort from Lisa in the kitchen, Oliver implores her to take a home economics class at the local high school. Before she knows it, Lisa is a fully enrolled student...the likes of which Hooterville High has never quite seen.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When the Hooterville City Council appoints Oliver (Eddie Albert) to judge the apple competition at the annual fair, he mistakes the honor for a real judgeship and prepares for his time on the bench! But a run-in with the real law clarifies matters.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa visits Oliver's mother who is recovering from an illness. The doctor advises that she rest in a peaceful environment...and thinks that Hooterville sounds absolutely ideal! Of course, he doesn't know Hooterville, where peace is never…very close.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When Oliver (Eddie Albert) discovers that Hooterville has a still-valid contract to build war planes, he spearheads the opening of a new government defense plant. But as chaos ensues, Oliver soon wonders if the move was a big mistake after all.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa is appointed as head of Hooterville's new Human Humane committee. A perfect fit for animal-lover Lisa, and a relief from her boredom in the countryside, she soon has a menagerie of both farm and exotic animals living at Green Acres.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver takes Lisa along to an agricultural convention. There, Lisa bonds with an ex-gangster couple, who insist upon teaching the Douglas's some of their shortcuts to successful farming. It turns out to be an offer that Oliver can not refuse.

programme.title: Green Acres

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: After an employee of the high school is a no-show for work, it is discovered her car was run off the road by the driver of a semi-truck, resulting in her death. Later, the prime suspect, her ex-husband, is also murdered. Who wanted them both dead?

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: After her involvement in a crime committed in Philadelphia, Regina, an old friend of Althea's runs to Sparta. She stays with Althea and sparks fly with Officer Sweet, but her past catches up when a dead body is found, and it's connected to her.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Tibbs is convinced that the right man is in custody for the recent murder in the Bottoms of a cab driver. The initial evidence points to his suspect, but Gillespie has his doubts and asks Tibbs to consider that race may be a factor in his choice.

programme.desc: Sparta Councilperson Harriet DeLong’s sister, Natalie, is found murdered, and Chief Gillespie has a suspect in mind, but it happens to be the most powerful man in town, so he’s keeping it quiet as he builds a case, much to the frustration of Tibbs.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night

programme.desc: Stone and Keller work to crack a kidnap case where the mother is the friend of an alleged psychic.

programme.desc: A killer and rapist is terrorizing the city, but Stone and Keller have almost no clues to lead them to the assailant.

programme.desc: In this two-hour season premiere of Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team, 600 hopeful candidates arrive at Cowboys Stadium for the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders preliminary auditions.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Training Camp opens and many of the new candidates have had to uproot their lives and move to Dallas with no guarantee of making it through Training Camp to become a Dallas Cowboy Cheerleader.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: It is just the second week of rehearsals and Kelli and Judy are quick to run the Training Camp Candidates through the signature kick line and jump split.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: In week three of training camp, the rookie candidates are brought in for their DCC makeover. Under the scrutiny of Kelli Finglass, new hairstyles and makeup applications give the girls the DCC look.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: It's week five of training camp and Kelli is out sick. DCC Technical Director, Kitty Carter, fills in and runs the first rehearsal of the week.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Week 7 of training camp begins with a rehearsal on the field at Cowboys Stadium. Kelli and Judy are ready to make final cuts and tonight's rehearsal could determine who makes the squad.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: It's time to announce the DCC squad but first Kelli and Judy put the candidates through a final field rehearsal at Cowboys Stadium. Tensions run high among the girls as Kelli and Judy watch their every step.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The squad has their first game day performance behind them, but after a bad rehearsal, Kelli warns her new team she will cut girls if they don't give 110 percent.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders take a break from the sidelines and travel to Mexico for their annual swimsuit calendar photo shoot.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders are in full dance mode preparing for their first regular-season home game performance. Kelli and Judy want the choreography to be perfect and press the girls through a few intense rehearsals.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: In the final episode of the series, the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders are preparing for their marquee performance - The Susan G. Komen Cancer Awareness Halftime Show during a nationally televised Cowboys football game.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Dreams are on the line as the tryouts for the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders 2013-2014 squad begin.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The pressure is mounting as 54 new candidates compete with 32 returning veterans for an invitation into the famed Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders training camp.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The "scariest night of training camp" kicks off this dramatic episode as the girls learn the dreaded jumpsplit! It's mind over body, as the girls attempt this famed and required move.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The ladies are really challenged when guest choreographer DJ Guthrie teaches them a new dance style. Kelli and Judy have some tough decisions to make about who will remain on the squad.

programme.title: The Giant Claw: A Walking With Dinosaurs Special
programme.desc: Zoologist Nigel Marvin travels back in time on a prehistoric safari.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Scientists study the perfectly preserved remains of an adolescent allosaurus they call Big Al.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: This scientific detective story traces the evidence for Big Al the allosaur's existence, using clues from climate change studies, forensics, and fossil records to bring him back to life.

programme.title: Walking With Cavemen
programme.desc: The lives of cavemen were nasty, brutish and short, but somehow they evolved over 3.5 million years into homo sapiens.

programme.title: Walking With Cavemen

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham is out to determine whether the Himalayan Yeti and the Sumatran Orang Pendek exist.

programme.title: The X-Creatures

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham searches for clues related to the existence of the Loch Ness Monster in Scotland. He also visits Australia to learn about a giant lizard called Megalania.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham sets out in search of stories about Bigfoot, a mythical ape-like creature that has been the focus of many fiction novels, movies and documentaries over the years.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham explores the English countryside to learn about mythical big cats such as the Beast of Bodmin and Beast of Exmoor.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham investigates whether the thylacine, aka Tasmanian tiger or Tasmanian wolf, have truly gone extinct. The species lived in Australia and Tasmania.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards joins the excavation of a subterranean chamber in the Yorkshire Dales where Bronze Age man buried the dead. Plus, there's the first ever prehistoric footprint found in a British cave.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards and Dr Betty O'Brien rely on their expertise and numerous tests to examine the connection between an archaeological site in Donegal and the history of Christianity in Ireland.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards joins the team excavating a massive stone coffin from a building site in Bristol, which should shed light on the Romans' extraordinarily industrious and lavish lifestyle.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards investigates an impressive coffin dug up in Malesbury Abbey. Among the possible identities of the body within are a Saxon king, and Elmer, a monk who survived his attempt to fly from the top of the Abbey tower.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: A team examines the remains of two crouched bodies found in the isolated Somerset community of Bleadon, where modern DNA testing reveals a picture of the arduous life of iron age farmers.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Today a team works on one of the most impressive Anglo-Saxon graveyards ever discovered, on the US air force base in Suffolk. A warrior is discovered buried besides his horse, encircled by graves holding children, some buried with full size weapon.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: An Archaeologist joins an excavation team as they uncover a rare find from Roman cemetery: a lead coffin, only the second ever to be found in the Roman Winchester. Clues found inside the coffin bring to light the pagan beliefs of a wealthy Roman.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: John visits a couple who wanted to build a garage next to their bungalow.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards joins the excavation of a long-lost chapel and the burials of medieval landowners in a farmer's field in Cheshire. Using science, genealogy and some detective work, the team are able to bring a man face to face with his ancestors.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards studies the Roman sarcophagus discovered at an archaeological site in Spitalfields. The findings include other objects that could reveal some unheard stories from British history.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
