programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos finalistas deberán trabajar con un arquitecto para diseñar los espacios del restaurante para el desafío de la cena final.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos últimos concursantes se enfrentan en su última competencia de la cena final. El ganador asume el cargo de Chef en el Borgata Hotel, Casino and Spa en Atlantic City.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En la primera parte del estreno de la temporada, dieciséis concursantes tienen la oportunidad de alcanzar el estrellato culinario y un puesto de Chef ejecutivo en la ciudad turística canadiense de Whistler, Columbia Británica.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En la parte final del estreno de temporada, vuelve un competidor de la quinta temporada y los quince cocineros restantes se preparan para una cena marinera.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay despierta a los Chefs restantes en medio de la noche y les ordena que preparen una cena de espaguetis para los bomberos hambrientos. Los perdedores deben lavar y encerar los camiones de bomberos.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los competidores deben crear perros calientes de proporciones perfectas para las celebridades Drew Lachey, John O'Hurley, Tom Green, Melinda Clarke, Christopher 'Kid' Reid y Kristy Swanson.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los doce Chefs restantes deberán planificar un saludo gastronómico por el regreso de un marine americano. El equipo perdedor tendrá que limpiar y decorar la fiesta de Tana Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los Chefs restantes deben crear comidas de tres platos que sumen solo 700 calorías. Los ganadores fueron a la playa con la jugadora de voleibol de playa Annett Davis.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los Chefs restantes tiran los dados para determinar qué ingredientes usar para su plato de desafío. El equipo ganador gana un viaje a Las Vegas.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los nueve Chefs restantes realizan una prueba de sabor a ciegas. Los ganadores cenan con el Chef Ramsay en un comedor completamente oscuro donde no pueden ver lo que están comiendo.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los Chefs restantes hacen crepes. Los ganadores cenarán en un restaurante francés mientras los perdedores se preparan para un servicio de cena con temática francesa.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Cobra commander activates the pyramid of darkness, stranding not only the JOES but also his comrades the crimson twins. Always prepared with a backup plan, Tomax and Xamot have other designs for the pyramid and Cobra.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Chaos ensues as the leaders of Cobra struggle for control of the pyramid of darkness. As Cobra forces battle each other, the Joe team is able to regain control of space station delta and launch a full-scale assault to try to destroy the Pyramid.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Cobra schemes to use the animals of the world against humanity with a mind-control signal enabling them to make any animal do their bidding, and the device causes Junkyard to turn on the Joes. Can they defeat Cobra and get Junkyard back to normal?

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: An investigative reporter is convinced that Cobra poses no threat to national security…he doesn't believe the terrorist organization even exists! he follows the Joes on a mission, determined to expose their battle as a massive government hoax.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Cobra steals an experimental nitrogen rocket fuel. But before the Joes can capture the crimson guard in possession of the fuel, he hides it in a greenhouse, where the volatile mixture mutates everything into gigantic man-killing plants.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero

programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine, the devastatingly sexy lady thief who'll stop at nothing to make her steal, has her sights set on a religious cult's secret treasure when a new man waltzes into her life: Lupin III.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A war is going down between the Italian and Chinese Mafias, and Fujiko ends up in the middle of it. A mysterious bodyguard named Daisuke Jigen stands at the heart of the matter, but who knows whose side he's really on?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: She's always getting in trouble / But she may give you a square deal / She's always sharing everything / Except for every steal / Even a lowly samurai / Is quick to see the appeal / How do you solve a problem like Fujiko Mine?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The famous diva Aiyan's bejeweled mask has been targeted by Lupin the Third, and Zenigata determines to "set a thief to catch a thief." Who will get to the mask first: Fujiko or Lupin?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Using her womanly wiles, Fujiko convinces Lupin to retrieve the legendary Laughing Peacock from an Egyptian pyramid. However, the seemingly simple job turns into a fierce race when Jigen sets his sights on the treasure too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko infiltrates a Catholic girls' school and sets about stealing all the maidens' hearts to pave the way for an even bigger theft. But Oscar knows exactly what she's up to, and he's got a plan to stop her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The nation of Carib is in political upheaval, and Fujiko is in the thick of the action, naturally. What is she doing posing as a reporter? Will revolutionary Philadel Kest win her heart where Lupin has failed? And what is Goemon doing on that fighter jet?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A fortune-teller supposedly able to predict his clients' deaths is for some reason seeking out Lupin's prior victims and giving them some very disturbing readings. What's the connection to Fujiko Mine, and how far will she go to see this job through?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Magical realism plus human trafficking plus Lupin and Daisuke Jigen plus a spa vacation plus Fujiko off the deep end equals... Well, you'll just have to find out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Count Almeida has a job for Lupin, and he's not about to take no for an answer. When Lupin and Zenigata both separately make their way to the Count's villa seeking answers, the trail of clues leads to a ghost town with just one inhabitant.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A recent string of particularly flashy thefts has been tied to Fujiko Mine, who seems to have taken to sending written warnings to the police just like Lupin does. But if you ask Inspector Zenigata, something smells fishy about the whole thing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Oscar's body is missing, girls are being kidnapped all over the world, and Lupin still hasn't made good on his threat to steal Fujiko Mine. There's only one thing to do: It's time to pay a visit to one Count Luís Yu Almeida.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: In the season finale, all the players have finally come together, and it's time to see how the tale ends.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4

programme.title: Súper Shore

programme.desc: Spencer se molesta cuando Carly empieza a salir con un nuevo chico que tiene muy mala reputación. Carly descubre que su nuevo novio tiene un secreto impresionante.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Cuando Missy, la vieja amiga de Carly regresa a Seattle, Sam cree que Missy está intentando reemplazarla como la mejor amiga de Carly; Spencer queda atrapado en el área de almacenamiento de un sótano.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly, Sam y Freddie pierden el URL de iCarly y lo consigue Nevel, quien exige un beso de Carly para devolvérselo. Por otra parte, Spencer pide 200 almohadas por error.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Sam y Freddie son obligados a compartir el mismo casillero después de ganar un concurso en la escuela; Carly le pide a Spencer darle clases de arte.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly desafía en broma a un campeón de artes marciales para una pelea durante una transmisión por Internet y se encuentra a ella misma en el cuadrilátero.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly desafía en broma a un campeón de artes marciales para una pelea durante una transmisión por Internet y se encuentra a ella misma en el cuadrilátero.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly, Sam y Freddie presentan los premios iCarly para el mejor contenido generado por el usuario; Spencer recluta la ayuda de modelos de trajes de baño europeas para hacer estatuillas.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Freddie intenta demostrar que la hermana gemela de Sam es sólo Sam disfrazada. Carly tutela a la némesis de Spencer.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Spencer se enoja cuando Carly empieza a salir con un chico nuevo que tiene muy mala reputación, de quien, más tarde, ella descubre que guarda un secreto increíble. Por otra parte, Sam le paga a Freddy para que le haga una página web.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly y sus amigos viajan a Los Ángeles para enfrentarse a los escritores de un programa que están copiando su material.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Cuando Sam accidentalmente revela que ella y Freddie compartieron un beso secreto, Carly los confronta sobre por qué nunca se lo dijeron. Spencer va a la cárcel para enseñar arte.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly, Sam y Freddie vencen a un chef famoso en un desafío de cocina. Spencer tiene una visión del futuro.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: El director Franklin es despedido tras aparecer como invitado en iCarly. Spencer contrata a una estrella del rodeo para que le enseñe a montar un toro mecánico.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly, Sam y Freddie deben tener una sesión de citas rápidas ya que se ven abrumados de chicos que quieren llevar a Carly a un baile. Spencer realiza un régimen de ejercicios extraño.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly, Sam y Freddie ayudan a una estrella de pop; Spencer descubre que su cita es la madre de Gibby.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly se enamorada de Freddie después de que él salva su vida; Sam y Spencer compiten uno contra el otro en una máquina de juego.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Después de estar de acuerdo para ayudar a un par de cómicos a hacer un vídeo, Carly y Sam debe elegir lados cuando los cómicos empiezan a luchar; Spencer se obsesiona con ganar un bote.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Después de estar de acuerdo para ayudar a un par de cómicos a hacer un vídeo, Carly y Sam debe elegir lados cuando los cómicos empiezan a luchar; Spencer se obsesiona con ganar un bote.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja y Calamardo se quedan varados en el desierto mientras entregan una pizza; Bob Esponja pierde su casa piña.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja y Patricio escuchan que sus héroes viven en una residencia de ancianos y deciden ir a buscarlos para que sigan defendiendo el bien; Bob Esponja pierde la confianza en sí mismo cuando Lubina le reclama que olvidó poner los pepinillos.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Ahora le toca a Bob Esponja ser el Monitor en la Escuela Náutica; Bob esponja lleva una medusa salvaje a casa pero se multiplica y toman el control.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Arenita envía un cohete al espacio; Don Cangrejo da a Bob Esponja un par de botas chillonas.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja decide tratar de vivir con las medusas; Calamardo intenta vender su casa a pesar de sus vecinos molestos.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Hay un concurso de talentos en el Rusty Krusty en "Culture Shock" y en "F.U.N." Bob Esponja decide tratar de entablar amistad con el malvado Plancton.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja ordena unas armas falsas; Calamardo finge ser un fantasma.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja lleva a la hija de Don Cangrejo al baile escolar. Bob Esponja y Calamardo compiten por ser el empleado del mes.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Our guests have been making a living by laying on their backs and they love it. They're here to shake their sheets clean and let their loved ones know that for a certain price they can be bought.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Mable is having an affair with her friend Cooikie's man, Levy. Although Levy has been cheating on Cookie, he still loves her and even proposes marriage! Next, Shae is here to confront her friend for sleeping with her man and get him back for good!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Diane is here to prove to John that he fathered her 2 kids. He was with Nicole and cheated with Diane. Both women got pregnant within 2 months. John did it again and Diane got pregnant, but he became abusive. Can Steve clear up this baby drama?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: Extreme Deception Indicated
programme.desc: Joe and Tammy have been together for 6 years and they have 2 children. Joe faces cheating accusations again and returns to Steve's stage for his lie detector results!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Tonya and Tamon hooked up and dated after she said she was pregnant. She said she miscarried after a fight. Her friend says she never mentioned the pregnancy. Then, a woman says her boyfriend is abusive, but are they even dating?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: After a bad split from Lasharon, Anthony was shocked to find out that she was pregnant except he couldn't find any evidence of it! Then, Anthony's ex Jennifer claimed she had his baby! Are these women lying to ruin their exes' relationships?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: Did You Ever Have My Baby?
programme.desc: Since he never saw evidence of her pregnancy, Robert is here to find out if his ex-girlfriend Sara was ever pregnant with their child. What will his lie detector results reveal?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: I Punch a Woman like I Punch a Man
programme.desc: Jackie’s family doesn't trust her boyfriend around her children, but she insists on staying with him. What horrible truth will Shaqualla's lie detector test reveal about her man?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: Did You Murder My Daughter?
programme.desc: Two years ago, Latisha and her boyfriend were found shot to death in their car. Latisha’s mother Nancy believes her ex-husband Kenneth was involved. Who is responsible for their deaths?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Kathern says that her perfect marriage fell apart when her husband Lance confessed to kissing another woman, but she thinks there is more! Then, Justine believes Dorian has been sleeping with his best friend, Anayah, but Dorian denies it!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Janisha is done with Terrence's family denying her kids! Janisha got pregnant while her man was in jail, so his family has their paternity doubts! A DNA test will get to the truth, but could the truth be too much to bear for this family?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Ashley and DeNorris accuse each other of cheating. Later, Jim denies serious allegations with his fiancee's sister and other young girls.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Kaliegh is 23 but has been a heroin addict for 5 years. Her mom, best friend, and an ex-boyfriend who got her hooked on heroin are here to beg her to go to rehab. Follow her as she travels to the rehab clinic and tries to get clean!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Kelsey says her husband is abusing her. Malcolm believes that Kelsey has been cheating on him since the beginning and that their two kids may belong to another man. Plus, Carrie's boyfriend Chris thinks their child belongs to her ex.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Nicky and Carissa have been on and off for 8-years, and Donald thinks she's still seeing Nicky. Then Chastity suffered a miscarriage and discovered Sean cheated, but now he says she's cheating with his relatives!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Devon slipped into a coma and is on life support. But before he fell into a coma, he told his mother that his ex Alisha said he did not father their son. Alisha denies ever saying this and feels his whole family has turned their backs on her.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Stephanie says that ever since she came home from work to find her 1-year-old with a black eye, she has feared that her children's babysitter harms them. Sitter Cheryl denies some serious accusations about a child.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Fred engañó a su amante Jay, ¡así que ahora Jay quiere su merecido! A continuación, la obsesión de Terry por su panda de peluche está a punto de hacer que su novia se vaya. Después, Benny le dirá a su amigo que usa ropa interior de mujer en secreto.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: ¡Dave cuenta que los regaños constantes de su novia lo han arrojado a los brazos de una mujer de 72 años! A continuación, Joe está a punto de decirle a su hermosa novia que tuvo un rollo de una noche con alguien increíble.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Josh y Amy descubrirán hoy que sus parejas han sido infieles. Después Madeline le contará a Andre que ha estado acostándose con Diante. Después, Quincy está comprometido con Callie pero ella no sabe que Quincy ha sido infiel con Amy.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Jen le contará a John que lo va a dejar por su amante secreto, Jerry, de 73 años. Después, Danika tiene una sorpresita para su prometido y se siente obligada a decirle que ella realmente es un hombre.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: John pesa casi 700 libras y no podría ser más feliz. Su novia Kim le hace elegir entre ella y un sándwich de 3 metros de largo. Él elige el sándwich.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: ¡Carla ha estado siendo infiel a su novio con su mejor amigo y su hermana! Después, Yvonne le contará a su amiga Marie que ha tenido relaciones sexuales con su novio. Mary Sue y su amante secreto, Cory, han venido a confrontar al novio de Mary Sue, Scott.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: ¡Jamie le ha sido infiel a su novio con una mujer! Después, Steve cree que su esposa ha sido infiel con otro hombre. A continuación, LaToya viene a causar un conflicto familiar. ¡Ella ha estado siendo infiel con la hermana de su novia!

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Jennifer se niega a dejar ir a su ex-novio, Marcus. Dice que lo recuperará a toda costa. Luego, Eddie dejó a Glinda y a su hijo de dos años hace 16 años. Hoy, Glinda le dice a Eddie que quiere que vuelva.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Angelo está aquí para contarle a su novia que es mujer. Luego, Mikey ha traído a su novia para contarle que le ha sido infiel. Después, Jennifer siente que debe decirle a su amante la verdad sobre su sexualidad

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Nicole quiere recuperar a su novio, pero solamente si él termina su trío. Mesha ha estado enamorada del mejor amigo de su marido, Jamie, por cuatro años, pero no acepta un "No" como respuesta.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Mehren dice que todo estaría bien con su novio, John, si su esposa los dejara en paz. ¡Greg ha venido a decirle a su novia que le ha sido infiel con su mejor amiga, Yolanda!

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Greg le contará a su novia, Deidra, que trabaja en secreto como prostituto gay. El novio de Madrina sigue siendo infiel a ella con su ex. Después, Ro-Ro tiene dos novias y hoy la obligarán a elegir a una de ellas.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Cliff quiere que Anna, la mejor amiga de su novia, los deje en paz. Después, el marido de Kelly le ruega que lo acepte de regreso, pero Kelly no quiere porque ya está con el hermano de su marido.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Gail quiere más emociones en su vida, por lo que ha estado acostándose con el novio de su mejor amiga. Después, Dave se entera de que su novia de los últimos 3 años tiene una aventura y está dispuesto a todo para recuperarla, incluso ponerse un sostén.

programme.title: Amor comprado
programme.desc: Martín se niega a devolver a Mariana al rancho de Saladino, como él lo exige y tienen una fuerte pelea. Todos los familiares de Luciano se reúnen para saber quién administrará la fortuna en su ausencia.

programme.title: Amor comprado
programme.desc: Arturo se suicida cuando comprende que nunca podrá tener el amor de Leonora. Ricky y Juliana acuden a la policía para obtener noticias sobre su abuelo, pero no tienen noticias.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Al haber revelado ante Eduarda su gran secreto acerca de su vinculación con Luis Mario, Mercedes toma la decisión de castigar a su hermana.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Tras informar a Eva del embarazo de Rosaura, Camelia invita a Eva para ser parte de la idea de asesinar a Rosaura, esperando así que eso se convierta en el motivo que precipite la decisión de Luis Mario.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Tras facilitar el escape de la cabaña cubierta bajo el fuego, Rosaura es la única víctima del voraz incendio. Eva se niega a reconocer el heroísmo de Rosaura.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Tras dar con el paradero de Rosaura, Luis Mario la conduce a la hacienda Arismendi.

programme.title: Acorralada
programme.desc: Fiona le suplica a Octavia que la deje quedarse en su casa mientras ella resuelve su situación. Diego e Ignacio se enteran que Diana se fue de la mansión y deciden buscarla.

programme.title: Acorralada
programme.desc: Samantha llama a Ignacio para decirle que no le pudo aplicar la inyección a Max porque Diana se lo impidió. Gaby regresa a la mansión.

programme.title: Acorralada
programme.desc: Gaby le pide a Miguelina que le mienta a Larry y le diga que ella está de viaje de luna de miel en Puerto Rico con Kike. Diana y Samantha tienen un nuevo enfrentamiento. Paola escapa de la casa tras pelear con su madre.

programme.title: Acorralada
programme.desc: Pancho tiene remordimientos de todo el daño que le hizo a Caramelo y a Paola por haberlas engañado. Deborah comienza a crear un plan junto a Isabel para vengarse de Diana.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Maribella y Sinaí preparan todo para que cuando Rosaura traiga el café se le caiga encima a Maribella, para echarle la culpa. La doctora le informa a Karina que deben hacerle los exámenes nuevamente.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Teobaldo piensa cumplir lo que le prometió a Mairita pero su mamá lo descubre. Maribella quiere que Luis Mario se acueste con ella. Pero el no lo acepta.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Teobaldo le confiesa a Rosaura que Angeliquita no es hija de su mamá. Gabriel le propone a Minerva que lo ayude a criar a su hijo. Teobaldo le vuelve a decir a Rosaura que no es verdad.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Eduarda llama a Rosaura, diciéndole que su hija está muerta. Karina le dice a Rosaura que no les haga caso. Eduarda y Maribella se ríen por la broma que le gastaron a Rosaura.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: The team jumps into action when JOC analyst Kelly Moran is taken hostage.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: After a mysterious bioweapon leaves two MTA workers dead and one injured, the team rushes to determine who is behind the attack and the location of their next target.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a professional informant after he's found dead outside an abandoned factory in Red Hook. Also, Maggie reconnects with an old colleague and mentor (Joelle Carter).

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: After a string of armed robberies target various businesses, the team investigates a suspect who leads them to something much bigger. Also, OA worries about his future when his investments begin to go south.

programme.title: FBI

programme.desc: Don and his team search for the stalker of a pop princess which turns into a murder investigation of a paparazzo.

programme.desc: Don and his team must solve the murder of a CFO of a large energy corporation who is found murdered on her doorstep and her young son is the only witness

programme.desc: The citizens of a small Long Island town are shocked when 13-year-old Annie Miller disappears on her way to school. Then, 24 hours later, her best friend is also reported missing.

programme.title: Without A Trace
programme.desc: Jack and the team search for a pregnant woman, Kathy Dobson, who disappeared from a hospital before being told that she has serious complications.

programme.title: Without A Trace

programme.title: Night of the Comet
programme.desc: A huge comet passes near the earth, vaporizing nearly the whole planet. But a few partially exposed people are now blood-thirsty zombies, and they begin a hunt for the remaining humans.

programme.title: Frankenhooker
programme.desc: A medical student sets out to recreate his decapitated fiancée by building her a new body made of Manhattan street prostitutes.

programme.title: Not Easily Broken
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling novel by T.D. Jakes, a couple's strength and faith are tested after the wife is injured in a car crash and her husband becomes attracted to another woman.

programme.title: House of Gucci
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story of the family behind the Italian fashion empire. When Patrizia Reggiani marries into the Gucci family, her unbridled ambition begins to unravel the family legacy and triggers a spiral of betrayal, decadence, and murder.

programme.title: Indecent Proposal
programme.desc: Demi Moore and Woody Harrelson are Diana and David Murphy, a financially strapped couple who are betting on a quick trip to Las Vegas to deal them a lucky hand. But the odds are suddenly even more attractive when billionaire John Gage ups the ante.

programme.desc: In a Sicilian town an aspiring poet in search of inspiration meets a folk singer.

programme.desc: A promising hip-hop rhymer from Los Angeles finds herself in a gray area when a record producer offers her a compromising shot at stardom.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In hopes of wooing a girl, Tristan promises to bring her a falling star. He soon discovers the star is actually a celestial beauty named Yvaine. When an old witch, Lamia attempts to steal Yvaine's youth, Tristan must protect her.

programme.title: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Air, Water, Earth, Fire. Four nations tied by destiny when Fire launches war against the others. Caught between the war, one Avatar discovers he's able to manipulate all four elements.

programme.title: Hugo

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal

programme.title: Beauty And The Beast
programme.desc: A struggling merchant stumbles upon the magical domain of the fearsome Beast, who sentences him to death for stealing a rose. As Belle valiantly attempts to release the Beast from his curse, the two discover that an unlikely bond blooms… true love.

programme.desc: Host John Catucci devours extreme grilled cheese at Cleveland's Melt Bar & Grilled.

programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Peter's, a family-run Italian restaurant in Babylon, New York. He discovers that the eatery is sinking because of its brash manager and co-owner.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay travels to The Olde Stone Mill in Tuckahoe, New York. Although the front has been renovated, the kitchen still serves less-than-stellar food.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay is in the Big Apple to revamp Dillon's, an Indian restaurant just blocks away from his own thriving eatery. Stubborn owner Mohammed loses approximately $25,000-$50,000 a month.

programme.title: The F Word (UK)
programme.desc: Can food affect a man's fertility? Gordon blames his own low sperm count on the fact that chefs are constantly exposed to high levels of heat. He enlists the help of a fertility expert and a clinical embryologist to see whether they support his theory.

programme.title: The F Word (UK)

programme.title: The F Word (UK)

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: Cosmic Collisions
programme.desc: Space is vast, yet it is full of collisions. Gas and dust electrostatically flock together, and gravity takes over coalescing grains into rocks. Those rocks become boulders, then asteroids colliding again and again, striking planets and each other.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: Gravity
programme.desc: Gravity keeps us on the ground and the planets in their orbits, yet we only notice it when it's not there. In space we cheat gravity; falling just as fast but missing the ground. Now this fundamental universal force is slowly giving up its secrets.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: Interface

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier
programme.desc: New satellites are being launched to continue detailed observations of Earth and its oceans and ice caps. They are finding that climate change is accelerating and they have the data to prove it.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier
programme.desc: NASA's Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe's Solar probe Mission. No spacecraft has traveled so fast or so close to a star before. The hope is to reveal the source of the solar winds that affect Earth.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier
programme.desc: The commercial space flight companies are edging closer and closer to flight readiness. Paying customers will soon be launching into space; tourist revenue is projected to be a major stepping stone toward space exploration and colonization.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier
programme.desc: The Japanese Asteroid Sample Return Mission has reached its target and is surveying the space rock, ready to dip down to acquire its sample. The return of asteroid material to Earth will aid scientists in the development of planetary defense systems.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier
programme.desc: Cubesats, miniature satellites that have been used exclusively in low Earth orbit for 15 years. Now, these tiny satellites are growing in mainstream popularity, and are being used for interplanetary missions as well. They have even been sent to Mars.

programme.title: Space: The New Frontier
programme.desc: The evidence to prove some of Einstein's theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now. It appears that Einstein is once again triumphant as we discover the latest in deep space observations.

programme.title: Sala de emergencias: Historias inéditas

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Soledad y Michelle sostienen una intensa conversación. Eloísa y Alcides tienen una fuerte discusión porque ella no ha logrado cumplir sus planes, pero alguien descubre que son cómplices.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Michelle obliga a Eloísa a ir a la comisaría, tiene las cartas de Alcides como prueba de sus intenciones. Hugo reconoce ante Daniel sus sentimientos y le advierte que se cuide de su hermano.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Alcides piensa que hacer con Michelle para que ella no arruine su estrategia con Soledad, después que Eloísa le dice todo lo que sucede. Daniel le avisa a Hugo que Michelle está desaparecida.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Eloísa inventa una serie de chismes Michelle. Ante su desaparición, Hugo decide ir tras ella, pero nadie se imagina lo que va a suceder con Aurora mientras él sale de viaje.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Sara y Norma se enfrentan a balazos con los pistoleros que acorralan a Juan, la policía encuentra algunas pistas. Fernando comienza a manipular en contra de sus hijas a una sumisa Gabriela.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Gabriela y Fernando llegan de la luna de miel cuando Pepa le prepara una divertida bienvenida a Jimena, Fernando anuncia nuevas reglas. La policía captura a varios sospechosos de los atentados.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Las Elizondo les explican a los Reyes que se quedan en la hacienda ante el peligro que se cierne sobre Gabriela. Fernando contrata como mayordomos a dos antiguos enemigos de los Reyes.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Leonidas vuelve a ofender a Ruth y Juan la defiende, pero Óscar impide que su hermano lo golpee porque es el médico que atendió a Jimena, Leonidas pide perdón, Eva encara a Raquel sobre Ruth.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Las Elizondo desconfían de Malcolm y Carmela, los nuevos empleados de Fernando, porque eran los antiguos mayordomos de Eduvina. Martín defiende a Dominga de las arbitrariedades de Carmela.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Martín insulta a Carmela, ella y Malcolm se dan cuenta de que el abuelo es un obstáculo en su camino, Norma trata de abrirle los ojos a Gabriela. Rosario visita la hacienda y se pelea con Sara.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dr. Marvin P. Gunderson is summoned to examine Kitty Kat, the ailing lion pet of the Addams Family. Morticia decides that it is the doctor who needs help. To build his confidence, human members of the family pretend to be ill so he can effect cures.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch suffers from unrequited love over Tiny Trivia (guest star Diane Jergens), Morticia's visiting school chum who only has eyes for show business. The entire family decides to try to turn their stolid butler into a new personality.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.desc: Jungle Jack is back at the barnyard with six of his favorite farm animal friends, like pot-bellied pigs, horses, cows, and even camels!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: It's all Relative
programme.desc: Prepare to be shocked and amazed, because today Jack is exploring the family trees of six wild animals! Believe it or not rlephants are related to manatees, the same is true for rhinos and tapirs, giraffe and okapi and more surprising animal relatives.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Get a glimpse of Jack in his own backyard on this trip to Bigfork, Montana. And, Jack and Sue visit Triple D Game Ranch to get an up-close look at bears, wolves, and even an elusive cougar.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Living Fossils
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he meets some of the most ancient species living on Earth. Red pandas, hoatzins, koalas, crocodiles and pelicans!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: In the wild, animals use their noses to find food, water and even mates! Today, Jungle Jack counts down the animal kingdom’s superior sniffers - from grizzly bears and sharks, to dogs and rhinos – find out which notable nose is the most powerful!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathaleen travel to a remote island in the Canadian Province of British Columbia to catch sight of the rare “Spirit Bear,” an all-white Black Bear. Kathaleen also takes a behind the scenes tour of a floating lodge.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Jungle Jack takes off on a very special egg hunt, looking for creatures big and small that hatch from eggs! Crocodiles, bald eagles, sea turtles, ostriches, penguins, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he heads to Pigeon Forge, Tennessee for an All-American Bald Eagle adventure with the American Eagle Foundation at Dollywood!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Get a glimpse of life on the Hanna's farm. Then he and Sue meet a couple that have dedicated their lives to providing a home for disabled dogs, cats, and horses. Jack heads to the eastern front of the Rocky Mountains for an old-fashioned cattle drive!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Zootastic Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jack for a globetrotting adventure as he counts down seven zoo-tastic adventures from the Australia Zoo to his home base, the Columbus Zoo! See which zoo is number one on this Wild Countdown!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for a weird and wonderful countdown celebrating some of the most unique animals on Earth. Pink River Dolphins, Emus, Sichuan Takin, Okapi, Gerenuk, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathleen travel to Winnipeg to experience the animals of Canada. At Oak Hammock Marsh, Jack visits a restored natural habitat that functions as a major stop for migratory birds.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack and Suzi are stunned to see the Great Migration in action as animals cross the Mara River into Tanzania's Serengeti National Park.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack travels to a special animal rescue center in the jungles of Costa Rica, and encounters creatures around every corner. Caiman, Toucan, Iguanas, Howler Monkeys and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Suzi head deep into South Africa's Addo National Park to learn more about its famous Elephant population, and the rest of the Big Seven that call Addo home.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Loango National Park in Gabon is often called Africa's Last Eden. Come along with Jack and his family as they explore the untouched wilderness, encountering Forest Elephants, Forest Buffalo, an injured Sea Turtle and the wildest beach on the planet!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack and Sue as they head to the southern tip of Chile to explore the untamed region of Patagonia! The land beneath the towering Andes Mountains is home to Condors, Guanacos, and some of the most beautiful Glaciers in the world.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is heading to his home state of Tennessee! He meets a one-of-a-kind farm animal living life to the fullest with a prosthetic leg, and a dedicated caregiver who's helping loads of native species get a second chance.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: On a camel trek in Israel, Jack learns first hand about the animal's unique physiology and important contribution to early trade. Later, Jack visits the International Camel Center.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: It's a Colorful Life
programme.desc: Wild animals flaunt their colors for all sorts of reasons: to send a warning, to attract a mate and sometimes, it’s just something they ate! Today, Jack is counting down seven amazing animals that aren’t shy about showing their true colors.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: At Home on the Range
programme.desc: Today, Jungle Jack saddles up for a farm fresh countdown! Donkeys, musk ox, camels, and all sorts of barnyard fun is in store as Jack travels to ranches and farms from North and South America to the Middle East.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: While in Barro Colorado, a dense forested island in Panama, Jack goes in search of a Harpy the world's largest eagle. The island is home to the famed Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Going the Distance
programme.desc: Jungle Jack counts down nature’s long-distance animal athletes!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: This adventure has Jungle Jack written all over it! Join in as we head deep into the Peruvian Amazon Rainforest get a rare look at Giant River Otters, Pre-Historic Birds, Caimans and much more!

programme.title: Jamie & Jimmy's Food Fight Club
programme.desc: Jamie helps actor Warwick Davis prepare beef and stilton pie; a Vietnamese feast, hog roast, and British honey.

programme.title: Jamie & Jimmy's Food Fight Club
programme.desc: The boys welcome Chris O'Dowd and Dawn O'Porter and make their favorite honeymoon meal - Caribbean red snapper. Plus ribs with whisky and Worcestershire BBQ sauce.

programme.title: Jamie's 30 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Jamie makes a classic British picnic including sausage rolls, mackerel pâté, lovely asparagus, crunchy salad, and Pimm's Eton mess.

programme.title: Jamie's 30 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Jamie cooks grilled sardines with crispy halloumi, watercress salad and figs, and thick chocolate mousse.

programme.title: Jamie's 30 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Jamie prepares steak Indian-style, with spinach and paneer salad, naan breads, and a mango dessert.

programme.title: Jamie's 30 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Tasty crusted cod with `my mashy peas', tartar sauce and warm garden salad.

programme.title: Jamie's 30 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Chicken skewers with satay sauce; a fiery noodle salad; fruit and mint sugar.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: Jamie cooks dinner for vendors at Borough Market.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: Jamie's organizes a reunion for friends he hasn't seen since high school; beer flows alongside a variety of finger foods.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: After preparing breakfast cosisting of yogurt, chilli scrambled egg wrap, and bloody mary, Jamie and his mates gather around the TV to watch England play in World Cup 2002.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: Pukka Tukka party food.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: Jamie treats his office staff to a Christmas dinner.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: Indoor barbecue.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: Jamie shows American students how to prepare traditional British food; fish and chips; minted mushy peas.

programme.title: Save With Jamie
programme.desc: Chef Jamie Oliver prepares a shoulder of pork and uses the leftovers in dim sum buns and meatloaf with spaghetti.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.desc: Jamie reinvents a roast chicken by combining it with the flavors of a Margherita pizza-basil, tomato and mozzarella -to create a glorious new family favorite, then whips up his Prawn toast toasties, the perfect snack for sharing.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.desc: Jamie rustles up his restaurant-quality avocado hollandaise and then he gets his son Buddy involved in cooking a different pizza for all the family to enjoy.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.desc: Jamie demonstrates an easy tray bake, chicken and pepper jalfrezi, where the oven does all the hard work; pierogi dumplings stuffed with broccoli and cheese.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.desc: Jamie whips up a cauliflower rice pie and shares his idea for elevating the simple salmon fillet with his version of a Cajun-spiced po'boy.

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food
programme.desc: Jamie takes on three comfort food classics; Jamie's ultimate burger.

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food
programme.desc: Jamie's friend Gennaro helps him make the perfect bolognese ravioli; the ultimate cheese toastie; chicken tikka masala cooked over an open fire.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking and Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver demonstrates some recipes, tips and hacks tailored for the unique times, including pork stir-fry, steamed dumplings, and best friend Jimmy Doherty's ultimate roast beef sarnie.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking and Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie shows how to make a vegetarian chilli and pasta with three easy sauces, homemade tagliatelle, a cheat's carbonara, and a simple tomato sauce.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking and Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver makes a risotto, a seven-veggie sauce, and an egg-free chocolate cake, proving that it is not difficult to create great dishes from the simplest ingredients.

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A stiff British ex-military officer is put in charge of the fun-loving and energy-filled Menudo group; a young couple is confouded because Doc seems very much in love with his visiting ex-wife, a fact Doc attributes to the fact that he is divorced.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A hurricane devastates the tropical island where a shore party of Capt. Stubing, his crew members, and passengers are held captive by a strange hermit while the Pacific Princess totters under the command of a bumbling deputy captain.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: In Part 2, the captain and crew are still marooned.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Julie's parents arrive on board the Pacific Princess and announce their plans to divorce.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A man makes a move on three women; not knowing that they are traveling companions.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Captain Stubing's Uncle Cyrus uses every trick in his devious mind to get Julie alone, until her "Aunt Phoebe" intervenes; a desperate businessman uses his daughter as bait to close a deal.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A shy young man becomes a completely different person at night; a businessman who doesn't have time for his family learns a valuable lesson.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: To the astute detective and forensic specialist, the biggest clues often hide in plain sight, and what seems trivial to some is in reality Critical Evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: They know as much about crime as any crime fighter, or any criminal. They're the crime writers, and through their eyes we see murder most foul.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Arson fires are set for their own sake, or to cover a different crime, such as murder. Think fire consumes all vital clues? Think again. Arson investigators can glean important clues from scorched rubble and ignite the unquenchable flames of justice.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The show examines cases of poison and deadly chemistry and shows how forensic experts are solving mysterious deaths today and from the past.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In most homicides, police rely on motive to pursue a murderer. But when the killer is a stranger…the crime may go unsolved for years. It takes a full arsenal of forensic techniques…to trace… a lethal encounter.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people do get away with murder, at least for a while. Flush with their success, serial killers murder again and again. But each time they kill, they leave behind a few more clues, which ultimately lead to their undoing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Black Boxes: Little evidence is left after an airplane takes a deadly plunge from the sky. Investigators' best hope for an answer comes from the flight data recorder known as a “black box.”

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: DNA Analysis: With the advent of DNA analysis, just a few microscopic cells found at a crime scene can be used to put a murder behind bars.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A friendly Midwest lodge becomes the scene of a gruesome double murder. Two men are dead and a safe filled with cash is missing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Poisoners are the most devious of killers, relying on stealth or their victim's trust in order to steal their lives. They're the most dangerous creatures in the world: smart assassins. And they usually don't stop at one kill.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensics in the O.J. Simpson Murder Trial: Millions watched on television as the jury rendered their verdict. Orenthal James Simpson was found not guilty of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When victims of murder know their killers, they are often caught off guard. But even the best-laid plans leave traces of the forsaken trust.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When there's a difficult case to crack – whether it involves drugs, arson, or weapons – the investigators and scientists of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms have the means to crack it.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Psychological Profiling: Journey into the dark recesses and calculated madness present only in our worst nightmares…and in the minds of serial killers.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Jordy goes on his first date with help from Ja and Brittney. After being grounded for slacking off at school, Jeff sneaks out of the house to go to a strip club.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Ja becomes Mr. Mom and quickly learns that a woman's work is never done. Brittney transforms into 'Bri-yonce' in hopes of finding her Jay-Z at a college costume party.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Brittney brings her new boyfriend home for Thanksgiving, and Ja gets more information about their relationship than he bargained for. The grannies compete to see who can bake the best pie.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Brittney, Jeff, and Jordy help Grandma Debra enter the digital dating game when they create an online dating profile. Meanwhile, Ja's attempt to fix Brittney's bathroom quickly goes down the toilet.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: When Tip finds an incriminating text on Niq Niq's phone, he sets out with Major to get to the bottom of things. Later, Tameka encourages Shekinah to join an improv group and sends the funniest person she knows to join her, King. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Tameka's brother Lil' Red stops by the house and asks King to join his grandfather's group, The Tams for a night. Meanwhile, Tip joins Deyjah in a baking class to perfect the homemade cupcake.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: When Shekinah moves into her new home, Tameka convinces her she needs home owner's boot camp. Back at the house, Tip is discouraged by his kids' lack of basketball skills and sets up a game with NBA star Josh Smith. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Fed up with Shekinah always saying she wants to be white, Tameka suggests they spend the day doing things white people do. Meanwhile, Tip discovers inappropriate pictures on his kids' social media accounts. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: After attending their first NASCAR event, Tip and Tameka argue over who's the better driver. With each of their personal cars on the line, the whole family joins in on the competition. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: King, Major, and Precious are hired for their first paid gig at the circus. Under pressure, will the kids step up to the challenge? Meanwhile, Messiah and Domani try to use Tip's know how to start their own fashion line. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Tameka and Shekinah decide to make a unique workout video for people who don't like to work out. Meanwhile, Tip takes the boys to LA for some business and pleasure. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: When Domani and King come home with less than stellar report cards, Tip takes matters into his own hands and hires them a tutor. Meanwhile, Tameka prepares her new girl group French Kiss for their first paid gig. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: As Tip heads out for the first leg of his two-month long nationwide tour with Lil' Wayne, the kids aren't ready for him to go and convince him to let them come.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: In the third season finale, Tip decides to take the family to Puerto Rico for a much needed getaway. Meanwhile, Tameka meets up with Niq Niq and the OMG Girlz as they embark on their newest tour.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: In an attempt to find out more about his daughter's lives, Tip participates in something he wouldn't normally do. But as the girls start to dish the details, is Tip ready to hear what they have to say? Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: After Messiah and Domani rescue Precious from an asthma attack, Tip makes sure the kids have proper training for any emergency situation. Meanwhile, Tameka and Shekinah head off to a retreat and put their friendship to the test. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: In an effort to teach their family about teamwork, Tip and Tameka take the kids to Space Camp. But when the kids have a difficult time working together, their mission becomes jeopardized. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: When Tameka finally convinces Tip to get the kids something they've wanted for years, the kids are ecstatic. But before it becomes official the kids are put to the test to see if they are responsible enough for something this big. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: When Russell Simmons stops by the Harris home he and Domani hit it off. With Niq Niq getting ready to leave the nest Tameka is having a hard time letting go and arranges a day for their friends to spend together to give them life advice. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: To set an example for her children, Tameka is motivated to hit the books and get her GED. Meanwhile, with his teenage sons racking up the phone bill, Tip takes them to a place where they can earn money - the hard way. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Shekinahshe seeks help from Tameka to try and find an assistant who can handle her growing work load and personal life. With Domani spending more time in the recording studio, Tip wants him to experience the full studio life. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: When King and Major rattle off a list of what they want to be when they grow up, Tameka decides to expose the boys to alternative options to expand their horizons. Tip makes a Make-A-Wish recipient's dream come true. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: When Tip chaperones Major's field trip to the fire station he takes it to another level with a surprise the kids will never forget. Meanwhile, Tameka's on a mission to get her mom out of the house after her dad's recent passing. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Majors first dance but he has to overcome his fears and ask a girl out on a date, learn to dance, get a suit and corsage. Will Major nerves get the best of him when the big moment comes?

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: The Harris family is embarking on a new business venture together - lemonade! The kids decide they want to start a lemonade business and Tip and Tameka are there to help them every step of the way.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Shekinah has a new hair product for sale and she wants to promote it by enlisting Tameka's help in producing an infomercial. Meanwhile, Tip takes his sons to a very special event.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Shekinah's chain smoking is driving Tameka crazy so she decides to take her to a hypnotist. Tip takes the kids to his old neighborhood where he shocks them with a very interesting hometown game.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: Alicia looks for answers after discovering her husband Eddie's betrayal on his federal surveillance tapes. Renee brings a new man out to meet the girls but an ill-advised comment by Natalie sends her into a rage.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: Tension between Renee and Natalie continues to grow while Drita's new domestic life isn't quite as blissful as she imagined. The women decide a getaway to Las Vegas is the perfect remedy for all their troubles.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: The girls start their first morning in Las Vegas trying to get Natalie and Renee to reconcile their issues. Amidst all the tension, Drita heads down to the casino to try and win back some of the thousands of dollars she lost.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: The women decide to make the most of their last night in Vegas by going to a strip club. When they get back home, Drita has to come clean to Lee about the $8000 she lost and Alicia has to face the reality of Eddie's sentencing.

programme.title: Mob Wives
programme.desc: When a tabloid newspaper runs several articles attacking Alicia, the women all speculate who could be feeding the press information. When Ang, Drita and Renee try to show support for Alicia, she shocks them with her accusations.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: A surprise blowout at Laura and Gloria's mixology event shocks the group, and Jackie and Doug Christie's trip to Seattle gets off to a rough start when Jackie and her daughters get real during a visit with a family therapist. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Jackie's suspicious of Laura's desire to speak with her daughters while in Seattle, and Draya, Brooke and Gloria's good time back in L.A. is interrupted by news of Matt's arrest. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: It's hell on wheels at Malaysia's 80's-themed roller skating party. Laura is confronted about her treatment of Jackie. Gloria shoots an explosive scene from her web series and the girls discuss an upcoming trip to Fashion Week in NYC. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Good news for Brooke means bad news for her relationship with Draya. Also, Bambi reacts when Gloria shuts her down during an argument.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: The ladies head to the Big Apple to walk the runway for Jackie's clothing line. More than flash bulbs and champagne corks start popping when Draya bails on a party to celebrate Brooke landing a major magazine cover. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: The ladies plot a trip to New Orleans, but when Bambi's ire toward Gloria ruins Laura's birthday plans, no one knows what to expect. Presented by VH1.

programme.desc: Karen is welcomed back to Staten Island after 10 long years of exile in Arizona, though loyal mafia daughter Renee is outraged by her presence at Carla's birthday party.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
